Text: My Eyes Adored You:  After the Motown label balked at the idea of releasing it, the recording was sold to lead singer Frankie Valli for $4000.
Triplets:<Frankie Valli
3:
--------------------
Text: My Eyes Adored You:  After rejections by Capitol and Atlantic Records, Valli succeeded in getting the recording released on Private Stock Records, but the owner/founder of the label wanted only Valli's name on the label.
